data.text:
What a fantastic time we had at this resort, just purely relaxing. 

This was our first time at the Sunrise Diamond Beach Resort in Sharm  (although we have stayed at equally beautiful Sunrise Resorts in Hurghada many times) and we were looked after so well.  ü•∞

We stayed in the Executive Pool Suite, both the rooms and pool were a delight. Ramy looked after our room so well and we loved his towel art.  This included the "Posh Club" facilities and services which we made use of every day.  Private areas on the beach and on the deck overlooking the beach.  We ate breakfast and lunch here most days and enjoyed talking with the staff over a glass or two of champagne.  Both Mustafa (the Manager) and Abd Allah made us feel so welcome and could not do enough for us.  I hope you are looking after that Champagne bottle stopper Mustafa üòÅ

The a la carte restaurants are all great and serve wonderful food but our favourites were definitely the Mongolian, what a great concept to pick all your own food and have it cooked in front of you (thank you to Samer and his staff for looking after us) and the Indian - Manohar, the Goan Shrimp Curry was amazing  (again Mustafa always made us most welcome).

Every evening after dinner we would make our way over to a couple of bar stools at The Latitue Bar to end the night with a few cocktails.  Mohamed and Mohiey worked so hard to keep all the patrons topped up with their favourite beverages and crisps and always with a smile on their faces.  It was a pleasure to get to know them a little during our stay.  Thank you for always having my favourite cocktails ready for me Mohiey and also for the dates.

Finally i have to save the biggest thanks to the Superstar who is Mohamed Maher (he overseas the Posh Club and all the Restaurants) and seemed to appear everywhere, he really could not do enough to ensure we had the very best stay and that everything was to our liking üëèüèªüëèüèª

The final touch was having all our Laundry collected and returned washed and ironed the next day ready to pack so no washing to do when we got home üëôüëñüëóüëöüòÅ

We will definitely be coming back
data.title: Amazing Staff and a wonder relaxing holiday

data.text:
Simply Magical!!! My family and I were treated with such care and attentiveness at Sunrise Diamond that it will forever be our favorite holiday memory. From the exquisite landscaping, gorgeous rooms with the best views , delicious food and the more than lovely staff , it was by far our favorite Resort and our top choice to stay when we return. I can‚Äôt thank the staff enough for their warm hospitality and helpfulness in ensuring that our stay was absolutely perfect . A special thanks to Miami for all your help .Thank You!!! See you soon!! 
The Mann Family from Barbados !
data.title: Perfect Holiday Resort

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. 592Mohaliam, 
Let us thank you for choosing SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select- for your holiday and for high rating of our services.
Your review is biggest motivation for us. We would like to express our gratitude for such warm review and especially that you mentioned name of team member who did your vacation. 
We hope time will pass very quickly and will see you very soon in SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select-.
With Best Regards,
Team of SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select-.
owner_response.author: Sunrise Diamond beach

data.text: EXCELLENT!! From start to finish we felt like royalty, greeted with "welcome Home" and it felt like it. Every single member of the team had a smile on their face and went above the call of duty to ensure complete satisfaction. Our room attendant Mahmoud was very good, Sayed in the family pool bar along with the lifeguards are a credit to the hotel. The restaurant manager Mohamod was exceptional offering to get anything required for our fussy eating granddaughter. Hanny the Mongolian manager was also a delight to speak with. There was also a very helpful man on reception that had a smile inducing smile! We were very impressed with the cleanliness and would like to return, there aren't many places we have said that about. Absolutely no complaints from any of us.
data.title: EXCELLENT

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Richard,
First of all we would like to thank you for choosing SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select- for your holidays. It was a pleasure for us to host you and on behalf of all team we would like to thank you for such valuable feedback.
We are pleased to know that you had "excellent" time with us and we hope that it will become your second home, as it will be the best appreciation of our work. 
We are counting the time to welcome you back in your second home in Egypt, SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select-. 
With Best Regards, 
Team of SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select-.
owner_response.author: Sunrise Diamond beach

data.text:
Great hotel staff cannot do enough for you. Great location clean food is great and a big shout out to Peter from the pool and Chloe from animation. 
Minor criticism are not enough sunbeds or shaded areas.
Big criticism the management over work there staff on the floor poor guys do to many hours and are pushed constantly was not good to see especially when it's done to a guy who is talking to a customer.
data.title: Fabulous hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Our Guest Gaz- Mari,
First of all we would like to thank you for choosing SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select- for your holidays. It was a pleasure for us to host you and on behalf of all team we would like to thank you for feedback.
Thank you for taking the time and sharing your vacation experience with us. Your evaluation is very important for us, we are taking to consideration each single guest recommendation.
Hotel Management has been informed about your review and the necessary actions will be implemented immediately. The team will do their best to act immediately to improve and our main target to reach maximum guest satisfaction
We would like to thank you for taking the time and helping us to develop our self.
Once again we would like to thank you for your time sharing vacation experience with us.
We hope very soon to welcome you back in your second home in Egypt, 
With Best Regards,
Team of SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select-
owner_response.author: Sunrise Diamond beach

data.text:
Really can‚Äôt recommend this hotel enough. I have have just returned after a week in Sharm with my friend and our two sons. We had the opportunity to relax and make plenty of special memories which will last a life time. 
Really can‚Äôt thank the animation team enough especially Miami who never failed to make us laugh and keep us busy. Fantastic entertainment for both children and adults both in the day and at night, the whole team work very hard to please the guests. We especially enjoyed the foam party! 
The hotel is in a great location and offers a great variety of food, drinks and snacks. All areas of the hotel including our rooms were cleaned and tidy.
Can‚Äôt wait to return soon‚Ä¶
data.title: Absolutely fantastic
